text: A Prayer for Deliverance from Enemies

For the \add music\add* director. Of David. To bring to remembrance.\f + \fr Ps 70 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm; the English verse number is reduced by one \f*
O God, \add make haste\add* to deliver me.
O Yahweh, make haste to help me.
Let them be ashamed and abashed
Let them be repulsed and humiliated
let them turn back because of their shame,
Let them rejoice and be glad in you,
Let them say continually, “God is great!”
But I \add am\add* poor and needy;
You \add are\add* my help and my deliverer.
